version_description:
Implemented Color Picker Feature
+ Tap the Eyedropper Icon in the palette editor to view the new color picker interface. Take a photo or select one from your photos library then touch the photo to select colors from the image.
+ Updated App Icons.
+ Minor performance improvements.

Minor Improvements
+ Added Copy | Paste options to the palette editor's "HEX" tab. Reveal these options by tapping the Hex code.
+ Updated palette drawing logic to remove spare pixels between colors.

Minor Improvements
~ Updated preview to provide RGB and HSB value options
~ Updated feedback email

Minor Improvements
+ Backward Compatibility for iOS 12.0
